Wali Kota Banda Aceh Terima Penghargaan Smart City dari Menteri Kominfo
07 Nov 2019, 00:25 by Syahril Ahmad


Wali Kota Banda Aceh Terima Penghargaan Smart City dari Menteri Kominfo

KBRN, Jakarta : Walikota Banda Aceh, H Aminullah Usman menerima penghargaan Gerakan Menuju 100 Smart City dari Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika (Kominfo) Republik Indonesia.
Penghargaan tersebut diterima Aminullah Penghargaan yang diserahkan langsung Menteri Kominfo RI Johnny G Plate pada acara pemberian penghargaan (Awarding) di Balai Sudirman, Menteng Dalam, Jakarta selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019). 
Aminullah usai acara mengatakan, terdapat beberapa elemen utama dalam kesiapan Banda Aceh untuk Smart City seperti potensi Alam, SDM yang sangat mendukung dengan adanya 15 Perguruan Tinggi di Kota Banda Aceh, adanya Komunitas-komunitas seperti Komunitas start Up, network security dan juga komunitas UKM/IKM yang aktif.
“Dalam hal infrastruktur, Alhamdulillah interkoneksi di kota Banda Aceh sudah di support oleh koneksi kecepatan tinggi berbasis fiber optic dan segi layanan aplikasi juga didukung oleh 125 aplikasi, 101 diantaranya bersifatnya terbuka/publik,” kata Aminullah.
“Dan Banda Aceh sudah memiliki Mall Pelayanan Publik dan sudah mulai beroperasi sebagai pendukung smart city,” tambah Wali Kota.
Wali kota menyebutkan, untuk mengumpulkan ide, inovasi dan masukan dari masyarakat, Kota Banda Aceh telah memiliki Portal Smart City, smartcity.bandaacehkota.go.id.
Selain sebagai jembatan untuk mengumpulkan masukan masyarakat, tambah Aminullah, portal ini juga berfungsi sebagai monitoring dan evaluasi kinerja skpk terkait program-program smart city di Kota Banda Aceh.
“Kami sebagai pimpinan kota memiliki dashboard untuk memonitor secara live program smart city dari SKPK dan stakeholders di Kota Banda Aceh,” tutup Aminullah.

Presentasikan Masterplan Smart City

Kota Banda Aceh menjadi satu dari 25 kabupaten/kota yang terpilih mempresentasikan rencana induk (masterplan), Menuju 100 Smart City 2019. Kegiatan ini diselenggarakan Kementerian dan Informatika RI, terkait evaluasi masterplan dan quick wins smart city. Dilaksanakan sejak 4 hingga 5 November 2019, bertempat di Balai Sudirman, Menteng Dalam, Jakarta selatan.
Walikota Banda Aceh, Aminullah Usman sendiri memaparkan langsung rencana pengembangan smart city Banda Aceh Selasa (5/11/2019) sore. Aminullah juga didampingi  Kadis Kominfotik Bustami, Kabid Hubungan Media dan Smart City Rahmat Kadafi, Ketua Penulis Dokumen Master Plan Smart City dari Unsyiah Muhd Iqbal, Plt. Kepala Bappeda Nila Herawati dan Staf Ahli Bappeda T Arriessa Sukhairi.
Di hadapan lima penguji dari kementerian kominfo, akademisi UGM dan pakar IT, Aminullah mempresentasikan masterplan serta pengembangan smart city Banda Aceh ke depan. Dengan harapan Kota Banda Aceh akan semakin maju dalam bidang teknologi informasi untuk diterapkan dalam pekerjaan dan pelayanan kepada masyarakat.
“Presentasi dimulai dengan memaparkan executive summary smart city Banda Aceh, selanjutnya diputarkan video quick Win dan dilanjutkan dengan tanya jawab,” kata Kadis Kominfotik Kota Banda Aceh Bustami.
“Para Asesor memberi nilai plus ke kita karena Pak Wali menyampaikan dengan bagus dan complete, dan dari dokumen yang telah kita susun, asesor menyatakan sudah sangat lengkap dan sepertinya kesiapan untuk smart city sudah oke,” kata Bustami didampingi Ketua Penulis Dokumen Master Plan Smart City Banda Aceh dari Unsyiah Muhd. Iqbal.
Terkait strategi penguatan untuk SDM, tambah Bustami, Alhamdulillah Banda Aceh punya strategi yang sangat baik untuk itu, dan kemkominfo sangat terbuka juga bekerja sama dengan Pemko Banda Aceh untuk dilibatkan dalam proses capacity building.
“Terkait desa tangguh bencana yang ditanyakan asesor, Alhamdulillah bisa dijawab sangat baik oleh Pak Wali dan termuat dalam strategi di Buku smart city Banda Aceh.” Imbuh Bustami.

The Mayor of Banda Aceh Receives the Smart City Award from the Minister of Communication and Information
Nov 7 2019, 00:25 by Syahril Ahmad


The Mayor of Banda Aceh Receives the Smart City Award from the Minister of Communication and Information

KBRN, Jakarta: The Mayor of Banda Aceh, H Aminullah Usman received an award for the Movement Towards 100 Smart City from the Ministry of Communication and Information Technology (Kominfo) of the Republic of Indonesia.
The award was received by Aminullah. The award was given directly by the Minister of Communication and Information Republic of Indonesia Johnny G Plate at the awarding ceremony at Balai Sudirman, Menteng Dalam, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Aminullah after the event said, there were several main elements in Banda Aceh's readiness for Smart City such as the potential of Nature, human resources who were very supportive of the existence of 15 Universities in the City of Banda Aceh, the existence of Communities such as the Start Up Community, network security and also the UKM / community Active SMIs.
"In terms of infrastructure, Alhamdulillah interconnection in the city of Banda Aceh has been supported by high-speed optical fiber-based connections and in terms of application services are also supported by 125 applications, 101 of which are open / public," said Aminullah.
"And Banda Aceh already has a Public Service Mall and has started operating as a support for smart cities," added the Mayor.
The mayor said, to gather ideas, innovations and input from the community, the City of Banda Aceh already has a Smart City Portal, smartcity.bandaacehkota.go.id.
Aside from being a bridge to gather public input, Aminullah added, the portal also functions as a monitoring and evaluation of the performance of the SKPK related to smart city programs in the city of Banda Aceh.
"We as city leaders have dashboards to monitor live smart city programs from SKPK and stakeholders in the city of Banda Aceh," concluded Aminullah.

Present the Smart City Masterplan

Banda Aceh City became one of the 25 selected districts / cities to present the master plan, Towards 100 Smart City 2019. This activity was held by the Ministry of Information and Republic of Indonesia, related to the evaluation of the master plan and quick wins smart city. Held from 4 to 5 November 2019, located at Balai Sudirman, Menteng Dalam, south Jakarta.
The Mayor of Banda Aceh, Aminullah Usman himself explained the plan to develop the Banda Aceh smart city on Tuesday (11/5/2019) afternoon. Aminullah was also accompanied by Head of Kominfotik Bustami, Head of Media and Smart City Relations Rahmat Kadafi, Chairwoman of the Smart City Master Plan Document from Unsyiah Muhd Iqbal, Plt. Head of Bappeda Nila Herawati and Bappeda Expert Staff T Arriessa Sukhairi.
In front of five examiners from the ministry of communication and information technology, UGM academics and IT experts, Aminullah presented the master plan and development of the Banda Aceh smart city going forward. With the hope that the City of Banda Aceh will increasingly advance in the field of information technology to be applied in work and services to the community.
"The presentation began with a presentation on the Banda Aceh smart city executive summary, then the quick Win video was played and continued with a question and answer session," said the Head of the Banda Aceh Kominfotik Bustami.
"The assessors gave us a plus because Mr. Guardian delivered well and complete, and from the documents that we have prepared, the assessors stated that they were very complete and it seems that the readiness for smart city is okay," Bustami said accompanied by the Chief Writer of the Smart City Master Plan Document Banda Aceh from Unsyiah Muhd. Iqbal
Regarding the strengthening strategy for HR, Bustami added, Alhamdulillah Banda Aceh had a very good strategy for this, and the Ministry of Communication and Information was very open and also collaborated with the Banda Aceh Government to be involved in the capacity building process.
"Regarding the disaster resilient village asked by the assessor, Alhamdulillah, Mr. Wali was able to answer very well and was included in the strategy in the Banda Aceh smart city book," said Bustami.
